CustomField.description: MLF customization May 2023. Identifies the User as a MLF business person responsible for managing a portfolio of managed Accounts, ie: a Relationship Manager. Secondly, identifies the Account Group / Tier the person belongs to. Functions in coordination with Account Object field Account Group.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies a person / User as a MLF Relationship Manager then further defines the Account grouping / tier the person is responsible for managing.
CustomField.label: Relationship Manager Group
